featured.text: With such support, spiritual leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei vowed, “We will rebuild Bam stronger than before.” 45.

definition.zh_def: 伊朗的宗教領袖，通常指在伊斯蘭教中具有高級地位的學者或神職人員。
definition.en_def: A high-ranking religious leader in Iran, often a scholar or cleric in Islam.
definition.example: The ayatollah issued a statement regarding the new policies.
